text: I follow a licence in communication. I want to become an editor. It feels like an evidence for me thanks to a woman: Alex Dupont. This wish came last year. I was reading a novel of a French author called Alex Dupont, like I said before. She is very inspiring for me. She is my favorite author of novel. Her novel are just incredible, the reading of her novel is just amazing, it is a huge pleasure. At this moment where I have this evidence, I was in a period of incertitude. I didn't realif know what I want to do in my life. I had some ideas like be a lawyer, or be a professor but nothing who was attractive for me. I had only this idea to answer at the questions of the people like « What do you want to study next year? » Or « what do you want to do of your life ? ». But in an evening in December 2021, I was reading a novel of Alex Dupont, « Et que ne durent que les moments doux » and it was like an evidence for me. At this day I know what I want to do of my life: be an editor. I loved books and read since I am a born. I had never think before of this option and honestly I don't why. I passed my childhood reading books. We said that our hobby in our childhood influence our future. It is the truth. After that revelation, I search how to become an editor and I see the different options. One of this options was to do during three years a licence of communication and after during two years do a specialization. I search on internet where I can do a licence of communication and I see that the college of Rennes 2 do that. To resume, it was Alex Dupont who was my source of inspiration. It is thanks to her that I am here
